featured.text: In teaching young players to cooperate with their fellows on the practice 32 , the game shows them the necessity of teamwork in society.
He realizes that only by cooperating can he do his 38 in making society what it should be.

definition.zh_def: 合作，協同工作以達成共同目標。
definition.en_def: To work together with others to achieve a common goal.
definition.example: The two companies decided to cooperate on the new project.
